column1: #Text=Huntsman says : " And the way Wan moves fire , it 's like nothing I 've ever seen .
#Text=We do n't have to live under Chou the Elder 's rules anymore , so I say we leave this city and start over .
#Text=" Wan says : " You ready to go , Mula ?
#Text=" Aye - aye spirit says : " You sure you want to leave ?
#Text=It 's time I see the rest of the world and find the other lion turtle cities .
#Text=" Aye - aye spirit says : " I 'm proud to call you my friend , Stinky .
#Text=" Wan says : " Thank you for everything .
#Text=" Friendly spirit # 1 says : " We 'll miss you .
